content: Yes, I can provide information on the operating hours of the public transportation in Santa Monica. The operating hours of the Big Blue Bus vary depending on the route. Most routes operate from approximately 5 am to midnight, with some routes having extended hours until 2 am. However, it's always best to check the schedule for your specific route to confirm the operating hours. The Los Angeles Metro rail and bus service operates from approximately 4 am to midnight, with some routes having extended hours until 2 am. Additionally, the Expo Line, which connects Santa Monica to downtown Los Angeles, operates until approximately 2 am. Breeze Bike Share and PEV electric bicycle share programs are available 24/7, with riders able to rent bikes and scooters at any time. Ride-share services like Uber and Lyft operate 24/7, with drivers available for rides at any hour. Overall, there are many transportation options available in Santa Monica during various times of the day or night. However, it is always best to check specific schedules and hours for the mode of transportation you plan to use to ensure availability during the hours you need.
